channel.title: Methods on Kailen Shantz, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Methods on Kailen Shantz, PhD

item.title: Methods
item.description: This project serves as an umbrella for any work I’ve done that is on methodology (e.g. testing or validating a method, empirically evaluating how well certain methods perform for solving certain problems), work in which I have developed novel methods for testing research questions, or any work of mine that has important methodological implications for how we conduct linguistic research.
